description: Resolve dependency issues in the plan

blockedStepDetails.title: Create Counter component
blockedStepDetails.description: Create a new functional component called Counter. Use the useState hook to manage the counter state.

blockedStepDetails.title: Implement increment and decrement buttons
blockedStepDetails.description: Add increment and decrement buttons to the Counter component. Use the onClick event to update the counter state accordingly.

blockedStepDetails.title: Add reset button
blockedStepDetails.description: Implement a reset button that sets the counter state back to 0 when clicked.

blockedStepDetails.title: Style Counter component with CSS modules
blockedStepDetails.description: Create a CSS module for the Counter component. Style the counter display, increment, decrement, and reset buttons.

blockedStepDetails.title: Conditionally style counter display
blockedStepDetails.description: Update the counter display styling based on its value. Use the className property to conditionally apply CSS classes for negative (red) and positive (green) values.

blockedStepDetails.title: Test Counter component
blockedStepDetails.description: Write unit tests for the Counter component to ensure it functions as expected. Test increment, decrement, reset functionality, and conditional styling.

blockedStepDetails.title: Add documentation
blockedStepDetails.description: Create a README file with basic documentation on how to use and customize the Counter component.

planContext.planDescription: Create a simple React counter component with increment and decrement buttons. The component will be a functional component using hooks, styled with CSS modules. It will include a reset button and conditionally style the counter display based on its value (red when negative, green when positive). Basic documentation will also be added.
